Blitz file handler commands
===========================

These commands handle operations pertaining to the autogenerated blitz action snippets.

* :doc:`list` - Print last 'n' autogenerated blitz snippets
* :doc:`remove` - Delete last 'n' autogenerated blitz snippets
* :doc:`save` - Save autogenerated blitz snippets into a testcase file
* :doc:`blitz_section` - Adds a new blitz test section
* :doc:`show` - Print autogenerated blitz snippets by test section

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:

   list
   remove
   save
   blitz_section
   show
